name: Forgotten Tavern: FOOD CRITICAL
description:
Max and Diana need your help, although Diana might be reluctant to admit that.

You should visit their humble establishment. If you help them with their problems, they can help you with yours.

You remember that problem of yours, right?

This game is an updated and improved version of the 2018 Interactive Fiction Competition entry, "The Forgotten Tavern." 

It includes:

  • Twice as many potential encounters on the other side of the portal.
  • Rebalanced combat — you can now get advice from Diana.
  • An "UNDO" option for players who make terrible choices that end the game early.

And be sure to check out Pushing Loyal People, a darkly humorous career simulator that asks whether you have what it takes to become the boss.
